overview: Who would believe it? Brad Star, the formerly dedicated and sought-after "top" explores the excitement of being a self-proclaimed Bad Ass Bottom. He identifies first as just a "bad ass," a tough guy, a stud whose cock bottoms want up their butts, on his way to showing his "other side." His revelations are interspersed with five sex scenes in which seven hot guys and he demonstrate the "thrill of man-on-man sex" - and bottoming.
title: Bad Ass Bottoms
